1.title: Payday 2: Part 1

episode of.title: The Really Hard Super Heroic Elite Legendary Veterans (TV Series 2013– )

1.plot: In this brand new series Mason & Tommy endeavour to play many different video games in the hardest ways possible. In the first part of the first episode find out if they truly live up to the self given titles; Really Hard Super Heroic Elite Legendary Veterans in the incredibly difficult Payday 2.

2.title: Payday 2: Part 2

episode of.title: The Really Hard Super Heroic Elite Legendary Veterans (TV Series 2013– )

2.plot: Jewelry Store? Pft. That was too easy, but how do Mason and Tommy do when facing the nightclub? You'll have to watch to find out...

3.title: Payday 2: Part 3

episode of.title: The Really Hard Super Heroic Elite Legendary Veterans (TV Series 2013– )

3.plot: Mason and Tommy ARE The Really Hard Super Heroic Elite Legendary Veterans. Let them prove it to you by watching this video and checking out their mad FPS skills YO (don't worry neither of them actually talk like that). This will be the last of a three part special of PAYDAY 2, make sure you tune in next week for some Rainbow Six Vegas 2! But this episode they finally take on THE BANK! DUN DUN DUNNNNN!

4.title: Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six Vegas 2

episode of.title: The Really Hard Super Heroic Elite Legendary Veterans (TV Series 2013– )

4.plot: So this feels more like the proper first episode, we'll call the others... pilots? Back with twice the screens and twice the... fun (yeah that's right, read this like it's the trailer for a 90s action film sequel).

5.title: Lord of the Rings: War in the North

episode of.title: The Really Hard Super Heroic Elite Legendary Veterans (TV Series 2013– )

5.plot: So Mason and Tommy didn't really live up to their long and noble title (that they gave to themselves) last week in Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six Vegas 2 (a name almost as long as the series' name). This week, as promised, they try their luck in Middle Earth with Lord of the Rings War in the North.
